DOC.criteria: 8 wk hemodialysis ESRD , write informed consent , negative serum pregnancy test appropriate , expect comply protocol procedure schedule know HIV , immunomodulatory drug , malignancy ( basal cell squamous cell carcinoma , carcinoma situ cervix , early stage prostate cancer ) , active infection 2 week prior study injection , serious S. aureus infection within last 3 month prior injection , use investigational drug , vaccine device within prior 30 day , hypersensitivity component StaphVAX
